sourcesContent:
ALBUM {{ b.id}}

Title:{{ b.title}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-album', templateUrl: './user-album.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class UserAlbumComponent implements OnInit { album:any; UserId:any; // albumId:any constructor( myRoute:ActivatedRoute,public UService: UsersService, public router:Router){ console.log(myRoute); // console.log(myRoute.snapshot); this.UserId = myRoute.snapshot.params["userId"]; // this.AlbumId=["id"]; // console.log(myRoute.snapshot); } ngOnInit(): void { this.UService.GetAllAlbumsbyuserId(this.UserId).subscribe({ next:(data)=>{ // console.log(data) this.album = data; }, error:(err)=>{console.log(err)} }) } Navigate(b:any){ this.router.navigate(['/', 'photos'], { queryParams: { userId: this.UserId ,albumId:b.id} }); } }
